vision.draw_points_on_image¶

vision.draw_points_on_image(image_path, point_list, radius=2, color=(255, 0, 0))[source]¶

Draw points on an image

Parameters

  • image_path (str) – path to image

  • point_list (list) – list of points in form (x, y) to draw on image

  • radius (int) – radius of points to draw in pixels

  • color (tuple) – color of points to draw

Examples

Calculate facial landmarks of an image and draw them on the imate

cloudburst
